meanings.definition: The art or practice of taking and processing photographs.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy learning about photography in my art class.
meanings.sent2: She has a passion for photography and takes beautiful pictures.
meanings.sent3: The photography club always has a flash of fun during their meetings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a camera, capturing memories with the precision of photography.
meanings.sent5: The colors in his photography were so vivid, they seemed to jump off the page.

meanings.definition: The occupation or activity of taking photographs.
meanings.sent1: Photography can be a rewarding career for those with a creative eye.
meanings.sent2: He decided to pursue photography as his profession.
meanings.sent3: The detective used photography to solve the mysterious case.
meanings.sent4: Her photography skills were like a secret weapon in capturing moments.
meanings.sent5: The art of photography requires patience and attention to detail.

meanings.definition: The process or art of producing images of objects on photosensitive surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The history of photography dates back to the invention of the camera obscura.
meanings.sent2: Photography has evolved significantly with advancements in technology.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat seemed to have a talent for knocking over photography equipment.
meanings.sent4: His words were like light painting a picture in the darkness of her photography.
meanings.sent5: The magic of photography lies in capturing a moment that can never be recreated.
